General.Name: X Terra Resources Inc
General.Description: X-Terra Resources Inc., an exploration stage company, engages in the acquisition, exploration, and development of mining properties in Canada. It explores for gold, copper, silver, nickel, and lithium deposits. The company was incorporated in 2013 and is headquartered in Rouyn-Noranda, Canada.
General.Address: 147, QuEbec Avenue, Rouyn-Noranda, QC, Canada, J9X 6M8
